attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At this current time of global economic, environmental and security turmoil, it is vital that the United Kingdom is led by a politically stable, publicly mandated government. It will be significantly damaging to our nation to continue as we are for another two years, and so a General Election must be called at the soonest opportunity.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
